title: Junior Frontend Developer
description: Build responsive web interfaces for startup clients. Work includes landing pages, component libraries, and responsive design implementation.

title: Junior Backend Developer
description: Develop and maintain REST APIs for web applications. Implement endpoints, handle validation, and write clean server-side code.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build end-to-end features for a SaaS analytics platform. Work across the stack from React frontends to Node.js APIs and database queries.

title: Software Engineer - Payments
description: Own payment infrastructure including Stripe integration, subscription billing, webhooks, and PCI compliance requirements.

title: Mobile Developer
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. Implement offline-first features, local storage, and background sync.

title: Senior Backend Engineer
description: Lead modernization of billing infrastructure from monolith to microservices. Architect scalable solutions with zero-downtime deployments.

title: Staff Software Engineer
description: Drive performance engineering for high-traffic e-commerce platform. Profile systems, identify bottlenecks, and lead optimization initiatives.

title: Data Engineer
description: Design and implement real-time data pipelines for ML systems. Build feature stores, ETL workflows, and streaming infrastructure.
